title: Final Fantasy: Legend of the Crystals (Dub)
alternative_title: Final Fantasy, ファイナルファンタジー
description: A continuation of the events from Final Fantasy V. 200 years after Bartz and his friends saved two worlds from the threat of ExDeath, a threat arises and seeks to take the Crystals for itself. Linaly, a descendant of Bartz, and her friend/protector Prettz journey to the Temple Of Wind to seek the source of this new danger.
